Added_Other.name: FFlagMediaPlaybackStopsWhenJoiningExperience_Staged
Added_Other.mechanism: Stops media playback when a player joins a game.
Added_Other.purpose: Enhances the player's experience by preventing distractions from media while loading into a game.

Added_Other.mechanism: Removes the prompt that asks children to update the game.
Added_Other.purpose: Reduces interruptions for younger players, allowing for a smoother gaming experience.
